title: Q1 - Who oversees Consent Managers - is it only the Data Protection Board, or also the government?
description: Consent Managers are registered and regulated by the Data Protection Board of India. The Board checks whether they meet technical, financial, and organizational requirements before granting registration (Schedule I).
